the [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed.

The charmed creature regards the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control, it takes the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Fey Charm for the next 24 hours. the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.
